Join Our Team

Build Your Career at TNR Business Solutions

We're looking for passionate professionals to join our growing team in Greensburg, PA. Help us deliver exceptional digital marketing and insurance services while advancing your career in a supportive, innovative environment.

Why Work With TNR Business Solutions?

Growth Opportunities

Advance your career with ongoing training, mentorship programs, and clear paths for promotion within our expanding organization.

Competitive Benefits

Enjoy comprehensive health insurance, retirement plans, paid time off, and performance-based bonuses.

Flexible Environment

Work-life balance matters to us. We offer flexible scheduling and hybrid work options when possible.

Local Impact

Make a real difference in your community by helping local businesses grow and thrive in Western Pennsylvania.

Innovation Focus

Be part of cutting-edge digital marketing strategies and stay ahead of industry trends and technologies.

Team Culture

Join a collaborative team that values creativity, integrity, and mutual support in achieving shared goals.

Current Job Openings

Digital Marketing Specialist

üìç Greensburg, PA üíº Full-time üí∞ $45,000 - $65,000

About the Role

We're seeking a creative and data-driven Digital Marketing Specialist to join our team. You'll be responsible for developing and executing comprehensive digital marketing campaigns across multiple channels, helping our clients achieve their business goals.

Responsibilities

  • Develop and implement digital marketing strategies for clients
  • Manage social media accounts and create engaging content
  • Execute email marketing campaigns and automation
  • Conduct SEO audits and implement optimization strategies
  • Analyze campaign performance and provide detailed reports
  • Collaborate with team members on integrated marketing initiatives
  • Stay current with digital marketing trends and best practices

Requirements

  • Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field
  • 2+ years of digital marketing experience
  • Proficiency in Google Analytics, Facebook Ads Manager, and email marketing platforms
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills
  • Experience with content management systems (WordPress preferred)
  • Basic understanding of HTML/CSS is a plus
Apply Now

Insurance Sales Representative

üìç Greensburg, PA üíº Full-time üí∞ $35,000 - $55,000 + Commission

About the Role

Join our insurance team as a Sales Representative and help individuals and businesses protect what matters most. This role offers excellent earning potential through competitive base salary plus commission structure.

Responsibilities

  • Prospect and develop new business opportunities
  • Conduct insurance needs assessments for clients
  • Present insurance solutions and explain coverage options
  • Process applications and handle policy changes
  • Maintain relationships with existing clients
  • Meet or exceed sales targets and goals
  • Stay current with insurance products and regulations

Requirements

  • High school diploma or equivalent (Bachelor's degree preferred)
  • Pennsylvania insurance license (or ability to obtain within 90 days)
  • 1+ years of sales experience preferred
  • Excellent interpersonal and communication skills
  • Strong customer service orientation
  • Proficiency with CRM systems and Microsoft Office
Apply Now

Web Developer

üìç Greensburg, PA üíº Full-time üí∞ $50,000 - $75,000

About the Role

We're looking for a talented Web Developer to create beautiful, functional websites for our clients. You'll work on diverse projects from small business sites to complex e-commerce platforms.

Responsibilities

  • Develop responsive websites using modern web technologies
  • Collaborate with designers to implement visual designs
  • Optimize websites for performance and SEO
  • Integrate third-party APIs and services
  • Maintain and update existing client websites
  • Provide technical support and training to clients
  • Stay current with web development trends and technologies

Requirements

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Web Development, or related field
  • 2+ years of web development experience
  • Proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and PHP
  • Experience with WordPress and other CMS platforms
  • Knowledge of responsive design principles
  • Familiarity with version control (Git)
  • Portfolio demonstrating web development skills
Apply Now

Business Development Manager

üìç Greensburg, PA üíº Full-time üí∞ $55,000 - $80,000

About the Role

Lead our business development efforts by identifying new opportunities, building strategic partnerships, and expanding our client base in the Western Pennsylvania market.

Responsibilities

  • Develop and execute business development strategies
  • Identify and pursue new business opportunities
  • Build and maintain relationships with potential clients
  • Participate in networking events and industry conferences
  • Prepare proposals and presentations for prospective clients
  • Collaborate with marketing team on lead generation
  • Track and report on business development metrics

Requirements

  • Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or related field
  • 3+ years of business development experience
  • Strong networking and relationship-building skills
  • Excellent presentation and communication abilities
  • Experience with CRM systems and sales processes
  • Knowledge of digital marketing and insurance industries
  • Proven track record of meeting sales targets
Apply Now

Application Process

How to Apply

  1. Submit Your Application: Click "Apply Now" on any job posting to send us your resume and cover letter
  2. Initial Review: Our team will review your application within 3-5 business days
  3. Phone Interview: Qualified candidates will be contacted for an initial phone screening
  4. In-Person Interview: Selected candidates will be invited for an in-person interview at our Greensburg office
  5. Decision: We'll notify all candidates of our hiring decision within one week

What We're Looking For

  • Passion for helping local businesses succeed
  • Strong work ethic and commitment to excellence
  • Ability to work both independently and as part of a team
  • Continuous learning mindset and adaptability
  • Professional communication skills
  • Alignment with our company values and culture

Don't See the Right Fit?

We're always looking for talented individuals to join our team. Send us your resume and let us know how you'd like to contribute to TNR Business Solutions.
